text:
Message 115 of 4024
Likewise! Thanks for the partnership!
Sent:12/28/2023 at 02:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2023 at 02:25 PM)
Subject:Re: Therapy Roundup
Message 116 of 4024
I was thinking about not being able to shoot for an hour while you were at work tomorrow. And I realize during the school year, that’s the schedule.
So no issues. It’s your time.
Then our plan says: “Spring Break and Winter Break should be alternated via even and odd years so that each parent has one of the breaks every year.”
We are on winter break.
Then for the actual holiday event we rotate Eve vs. Day. But given the plan, it seems I am getting the school allotted days while they are on break. Is
that intentional?
TBH- spring and winter are nowhere near the same (I think) so not sure the plan really accounts for our real world. And next winter I don’t really
expect two full weeks - Xmas day.
It just seems ill conceived and we are making up some weird hybrid. Most importantly - I AM NOT bitching. This is not a knock. You have been very
helpful. But it’s not the plan, right?
Please, please, don’t take it as fighting or snarky. Just tell me I’m wrong if you think I am. But the first pass through the calendar is going to be a
learning experience for us.
Thank you!
Sent:12/28/2023 at 04:59 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2023 at 05:03 PM)
Subject:Winter Break (not urgent)
Message 117 of 4024
That was part of the plan I planned to discuss with you. Given we are in Phase 1, I don’t believe that counts yet but we can debate more in the call
tomorrow at 9am.
Max is definitely something we need to discuss given the reunification therapy.
Anyway. Let’s save for tomorrow discussion as we will not solve on this thread tonight.
Sent:12/28/2023 at 05:07 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2023 at 05:29 PM)
Subject:Re: Winter Break (not urgent)
